page.title: 19Fright,Bradford
page.content: We had a discussion in our class and these are the things that scare us.We are afraid of the dark,especially when we are in bed at night, nightmares, murderers,graveyards and noises in the dark.We are scared that we might see a ghost.Creaking boards make our blood run cold.We don't go near haunted houses either.We are scared of wars and bombs,especially nuclear bombs that can destroy the World. Some of us don't like people doing karate.They might fling us to the ground and hurt us.Some animals scare us,like snakes, cheetahs ,dogs ,owls ,rats ,mice ,gorillas ,big fish and also bees and wasps.We also fear fire, electric shocks and high places.
